Reviews.Title: still no response from seller
Reviews.Author: Reginald H.
Reviews.Content: well, where do I start. shipping was far more faster than expected super early,recieved the phone watch and carefully inspected it and followed the instructions.installed a T-Mobile active sims card to my surprise the phone worked better than expected.two weeks later without warning it stopped reading the sims card and would not respond to reboot.i contacted the seller and he responded by asking "what type of sims card did I put in it" I responded the same day and I heard nothing more from him,a day later I sent two more messages asking how do I correct the issue or I need to send it back waited another week and still no response so the other day I put in a request to send the item back and im still awaiting a response from the sender.not a happy camper!

Reviews.Title: great product,
Reviews.Author: kam
Reviews.Content: Please keep the price down,it is fun to have,still working,well made,great pick up for women,I am married,but I do see how other women look at me like cool,&what; is he doing, it is fun to have,thank you,

Reviews.Title: watch cell phone
Reviews.Author: chris lofton
Reviews.Content: cant even find the right kind of sim card to make the phone work.I've  had it since april and still haven't used the phone just a waste of my money.

Reviews.Title: Mad about nothing
Reviews.Author: The zombie keeper
Reviews.Content: Oh this watch / phone it's cool it's mice looking but no Bluetooth and that interface in the pic is not the interface of the phone it is like 1999 old and busted lol but unlocked GSM

ProductInfo.Name: New N388 Unlocked 1.4" Touch Screen Watch Mobile Phone Adjustable Band Cell phone
